text: The North American Aviation T2J Buckeye is an American training jet aircraft. From 1959 to 1962 it was called T2J but since 1962 it is called T-2. It was one of the major training aircraft of the US Navy. Some were used in Vietnam War for observations flights. A lot of T2J were used in Greece and Venezuela. Category:United States Navy aircraft Category:Vietnam War aircraft
title: North American Aviation T2J Buckeye
